Package com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud

Class HUDPanel.HUDRenderer

java.lang.Object
com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud.HUDPanel.HUDRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderer
Enclosing class:
HUDPanel
protected static class HUDPanel.HUDRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderer
Proxy for a Renderer, doesn't display container, when GUI is off.

      renderer - the base renderer
      guiOpen - whether to accept input and render container itself or not
      minBorder - the minimum border for the container

      public int getOffset()
